fields.request: Verify authenticator login when some devices require passwords
fields.request_details: Create two authenticator devices (Security > Authenticator devices) for the same account, keeping one with 'Allow without a password' disabled and enabling it on the other. Confirm the login page pre-check shows the password field, then log in with the passwordless device's code without entering a password and with the password-required device's code while providing the password. Finally, assign a device to a security group and verify a member of that group can sign in with its code.
